card.name: Melchior Mantle
card.text: Machinate {3}{W}{W} Enchant creature you control Enchanted creature gets +4/+4, has lifelink and "Whenever this creature attacks, create two 1/0 colorless Spirit creature tokens that are tapped and attacking, then put a +1/+1 counter on each of them," and is a God. When enchanted creature dies, return Melchior Mantle to the battlefield.

card.name: Alnico Mantle
card.text: Machinate {3}{U}{U} Enchant creature you control Enchanted creature gets +4/+4, has flying and "Whenever this creature attacks, look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard," and is a God. When enchanted creature dies, return Alnico Mantle to the battlefield.

card.name: Nicrosil Mantle
card.text: Machinate {3}{B}{B} Enchant creature you control Enchanted creature gets +4/+4, has menace and "Whenever this creature attacks, choose creature or planeswalker. The defending player sacrifices a permanent of the chosen type," and is a God. When enchanted creature dies, return Nicrosil Mantle to the battlefield.

card.name: Talonite Mantle
card.text: Machinate {3}{R}{R} Enchant creature you control Enchanted creature gets +4/+4, has trample and "Whenever this creature attacks, it deals 2 damage to each of up to one target creature, up to one target player, and up to one target planeswalker," and is a God. When enchanted creature dies, return Talonite Mantle to the battlefield.

card.name: Vitallium Mantle
card.text: Machinate {3}{G}{G} Enchant creature you control Enchanted creature gets +4/+4, has vigilance and "Whenever this creature attacks, target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn," and is a God. When enchanted creature dies, return Vitallium Mantle to the battlefield.

card.name: The Grand Restabilizer
card.text: At the beginning of your end step, you get {E} for each tapped artifact you control. {T}, Discard a card: Look at the top three cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. {T}, Pay {E}{E}{E}{E}{E}{E}{E}{E}: Draw a card, then you may cast a spell from your hand without paying its mana cost. When you do, copy it. You may choose new targets for the copy.

card.name: Vernus Prioleau
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, look at the top three cards of your library. Put one back on top and the rest into your graveyard. {3}{U}{B}: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. Create a 1/1 colorless Puppet artifact creature token with all abilities of that card, then create an X/X black Horror creature token, where X is that card's mana value.

card.name: Althea Elmstone
card.text: Vigilance Althea Elmstone gets +1/+1 for each land creature you control. {1}{G}{W}: Put three +1/+1 counters on target land you control. If it isn't a creature, you may have it become a 0/0 Elemental creature with vigilance and haste that's still a land.

card.name: Flexuous Migration
card.text: Create four 0/0 green Snake Hydra creature tokens with trample, then distribute sixteen +1/+1 counters among Hydras you control.

card.name: Slagsluice Hellkite
card.text: Flying, haste If a source you control would deal damage to a player, it deals X times that damage instead, where X is the number of spells you've cast this turn. (If you haven't cast a spell this turn, your sources deal no damage.)

card.name: Vertilene, Woeful Widow
card.text: --- (Back): Vertilene, Pallid Queen

card.name: Vertilene, Pallid Queen
card.text: Deathtouch Zombies you control get +1/+1 and have deathtouch. {1}{B}{G}: Target Zombie gains indestructible until end of turn. --- (Front): Vertilene, Woeful Widow

card.text: --- (Back): She Who the Blood Forsook

card.name: She Who the Blood Forsook
card.text: --- (Front): Arietta, Forsworn

card.name: Om, Hope of a Generation
card.text: Vigilance {2}{W}: Om gains double strike until end of turn. At your end of combat, if Om dealt 2 or more combat damage this turn, put a +1/+1 counter on them. Then if they dealt 4 or more combat damage this turn, untap target creature you control. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase. This ability triggers only once each turn.

card.name: Spindleghast
card.text: Lifelink When Spindleghast enters the battlefield, target nonland permanent an opponent controls becomes a colorless artifact with no abilities until Spindleghast leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Wired Centurion
card.text: Wired Centurion enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it. {1}, Remove a +1/+1 counter from Wired Centurion: Create a 1/1 colorless Puppet artifact creature token. Whenever a Puppet you control dies, you may pay {1}. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on Wired Centurion.

card.name: Tenders of the Fold
card.text: Flash Flying When Tenders of the Fold enters the battlefield, look at the top five cards of your library. You may put a Spirit card with mana value 3 or less from among them onto the battlefield. If you do, each opponent may draw a card. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Auto-Configurator
card.text: At the beginning of combat on your turn, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature. Whenever you attack with three or more creatures, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

card.name: Embrace Symmetry
card.text: Each opponent who controls more creatures than you chooses a creature they control and exiles it. Repeat this process for artifacts, enchantments, planeswalkers, and cards in hand. For as long as cards exiled this way remain exiled, their owners may cast them. A spell cast this way costs {2} more to cast.

card.name: The Pearl Tomb of Sëh
card.text: {1}, {T}: You gain 1 life. Put a charge counter on The Pearl Tomb of Sëh. {2}, {T}, Remove two charge counters from The Pearl Tomb of Sëh: Create Sëh's Sceptre, a legendary colorless Equipment artifact token with "Equipped creature has indestructible as long as it's untapped" and equip {2}. {4}, {T}, Remove four charge counters from The Pearl Tomb of Sëh and exile it: Create Sëh, a legendary 8/8 white Angel Construct artifact creature token with flying, vigilance, and lifelink.

card.name: Ipseity Disturbance
card.text: Cast target nonland permanent without paying its mana cost. (It enters the battlefield under your control.)

card.name: Weight of Remorse
card.text: Machinate {2}{W}{B} (You may cast this spell with no targets for its machinate cost. If you do, create a 1/1 Puppet, then attach this to it.) Enchant creature When Weight of Remorse enters the battlefield, destroy all creatures other than enchanted creature. Enchanted creature has "You can't win the game and your opponents can't lose the game."

card.name: Eli, Wise to the Winds
card.text: Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, create a tapped 2/2 blue Drake Construct artifact creature token with flying. That token doesn't untap during your untap step for as long as you control Eli. This ability triggers only once each turn. {1}{U}, Sacrifice a creature: Copy target instant or sorcery spell with mana value 3 or less. You may choose new targets for the copy.

card.name: Skyblight
card.text: Flying When Skyblight enters the battlefield, draw a card. Spirits you control have ward {X}, where X is the number of cards in your hand. (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {X}.)

card.name: Arcane Contortionist
card.text: Moxie (You may have this enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter. If you don't, get {E}{E}.) Whenever Arcane Contortionist attacks, you may pay {E}. If you do, draw cards equal to Arcane Contortionist's power, then discard a card.

card.name: Aeon Vassal
card.text: Flying When Aeon Vassal enters the battlefield, choose up to one target instant card and up to one target sorcery card in your graveyard. You may cast a card chosen this way without paying its mana cost. Return the rest to your hand.

card.name: Dynamo Surge
card.text: You get {E}{E}{E}{E}, then you may pay any amount of {E}. Return each creature with toughness less than or equal to the amount of {E} paid this way to its owner's hand.

card.name: Call of the Cosmos
card.text: Create X tapped tokens that are copies of target creature you control. Exile those tokens at the beginning of the next end step.

card.name: Florid Laboratory
card.text: When Florid Laboratory enters the battlefield, you get {E}. Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature you control, then put a loyalty counter on up to one target planeswalker you control. {4}{U}{U}, {T}: Proliferate, then proliferate again. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players with counters on them, then give each another counter of each kind already there. Then do it again.)

card.name: Gemwing Phoenix
card.text: Flying Moxie (You may have this enter the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter. If you don't, get {E}{E}.) Gemwing Phoenix attacks each combat if able. At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may pay {E}{E}{E}{E}. If you do, return Gemwing Phoenix from your graveyard to the battlefield. It gains haste until end of turn.

card.name: Lonzo, Dark Dramaturge
card.text: Puppets you control have all activated abilities of Lonzo. {B}, Sacrifice another creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Lonzo. {2}{B}{B}, {T}: Destroy target creature if its power is less than or equal to Lonzo's power.

card.name: Masquerade Meister
card.text: When Masquerade Meister enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice another creature. If you do, each opponent sacrifices a creature. Whenever a nontoken creature an opponent controls dies, exile it, then create a 1/1 colorless Puppet artifact creature token with all abilities of that card.

card.name: Skeletal Sculptor
card.text: When Skeletal Sculptor enters the battlefield, return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield until Skeletal Sculptor leaves the battlefield. That creature has base power and toughness 4/4.

card.name: Seryph of Braided Fates
card.text: Flying Whenever an Aura enters the battlefield under your control attached to a creature an opponent controls with mana value 4 or less, gain control of that creature, then that opponent creates a 1/1 colorless Puppet artifact creature token.

card.name: Sinslither
card.text: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each poison counter your opponents have. Poisonous 1 (Whenever this creature deals combat damage to a player, that player gets a poison counter. A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.) At the beginning of your end step, each opponent with seven or more poison counters loses the game.

card.name: Practical Repurpose
card.text: Practical Repurpose deals 3 damage to up to one target creature or planeswalker. Each opponent discards a card and loses 3 life. Create a 3/3 colorless Construct artifact creature token. You draw a card and you gain 3 life.

card.name: Lichcraft
card.text: When Lichcraft enters the battlefield, exile the top five cards of your library. Your life total becomes -5. You don't lose the game for having 0 or less life. At the beginning of your upkeep, put one or more cards exiled with Lichcraft into your hand. Then if there are no cards exiled with Lichcraft, sacrifice it. Whenever a creature you control dies, exile the top card of your library and you gain 1 life.

card.name: Material Gain
card.text: Create a 1/1 colorless Puppet artifact creature token, then choose two — • Each player sacrifices an artifact. • Each player sacrifices a creature. • Each player sacrifices a planeswalker.

card.name: Fossorial Vermin
card.text: Fossorial Vermin gets +1/+1 for each card type among permanents you control. When Fossorial Vermin dies, you may exile it. If you do, return target permanent card in your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Flux Harnesser
card.text: Flux Harnesser gets +3/+0 as long as you've cast two or more instant or sorcery spells this turn. Whenever Flux Harnesser attacks, you may discard a land card. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Hysterical Mob
card.text: Trample Whenever a creature an opponent controls is dealt excess damage by another red source you control, Hysterical Mob deals damage equal to the excess to that player.

card.name: Abiel, the Great Director

Abiel deals 1 damage to any target.

You may play the others this turn.

card.text: Whenever one or more creatures you control deal combat damage to a player, you may destroy target artifact or enchantment that player controls. Whenever you cast a green creature spell, create a 3/3 green Wurm creature token with trample.

card.name: When the Stars Align
card.text: You gain 5 life and draw a card. Then if you've cast spells named When the Stars Align five times this game, you win the game. Augmented — If you've spent {W}{U}{B}{R}{G} on spells this turn, you may shuffle When the Stars Align into your library.

card.name: Last Passage
card.text: Forebode three times, then untap each Omen you control. Until end of turn, if you would draw a card while your library has no cards in it, you win the game instead. (Create three tapped colorless Omen artifact tokens with "{T}, Discard a card, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")

card.name: Between Life and Death
card.text: Return up to two target creature cards with mana value X or less from your graveyard to the battlefield. They can't block this turn.

card.name: Spontaneous Conception
card.text: Spontaneous Conception deals X damage to any target. Exile the top X cards of your library. You may cast a card with mana value X or less from among them without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Stand Unassailable
card.text: You gain 7 life. Coalesce {5}{G}{G} (You may cast this from your graveyard for {5}{G}{G}. If you do, put it onto the battlefield as a Horror creature after it resolves. Exile it if it would leave the battlefield or not resolve.)

card.name: Karmic Guide
card.text: Flying, protection from black Echo {3}{W}{W} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.) When Karmic Guide enters the battlefield, return target creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Nexus of Fate
card.text: Take an extra turn after this one. If Nexus of Fate would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, reveal Nexus of Fate and shuffle it into its owner's library instead.

card.name: Thoughtseize
card.text: Target player reveals their hand. You choose a nonland card from it. That player discards that card. You lose 2 life.

card.name: Cathartic Reunion
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard two cards. Draw three cards.

card.name: Collected Company
card.text: Look at the top six cards of your library. Put up to two creature cards with mana value 3 or less from among them onto the battlefield. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

card.name: Ipseity Disturbance
card.text: Cast target nonland permanent without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Vernus Prioleau
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, look at the top three cards of your library. Put one back on top and the rest into your graveyard. {3}{U}{B}: Exile target creature card from a graveyard. Create a 1/1 colorless Puppet artifact creature token with all abilities of that card, then create an X/X black Horror creature token, where X is that card's mana value.

card.name: All or Nothing
card.text: Choose a number. Reveal that many cards from the top of your library and put them into your hand. You lose life equal to the total mana value of those cards.

card.name: Vivid Mirage
card.text: Create a token that's a copy of target creature or land you control, except it has haste and "At the beginning of the end step, exile this permanent." If a land you control was targeted this way, create two of those tokens instead.

card.name: Althea Elmstone
card.text: Vigilance Althea Elmstone gets +1/+1 for each land creature you control. {1}{G}{W}: Put three +1/+1 counters on target land you control. If it isn't a creature, you may have it become a 0/0 Elemental creature with vigilance and haste that's still a land.

card.name: At the Gallows
card.text: Whenever a non-Spirit creature deals combat damage to a player, destroy that creature. Its controller creates a 1/1 colorless Spirit creature token.

card.name: Singularity's Grasp
card.text: Each creature gets -X/-X until end of turn. Destroy each artifact and enchantment with mana value X or less.

card.name: Imaginative Dreamer
card.text: You may have Imaginative Dreamer enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield. When it does, it stops being a copy.

card.name: Miyoga Firebird
card.text: Flying, haste Miyoga Firebird attacks each combat if able. Whenever you cast your third instant or sorcery spell this turn, you may return Miyoga Firebird from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Patience, Forsworn Student
card.text: When Patience enters the battlefield, choose two at random from among flying, first strike, lifelink, menace, trample, vigilance, and +1/+1. Create a colorless Equipment artifact token with equip 3 that grants the chosen effects, then attach it to Patience.
